title: Modeling late-onset Alzheimer’s disease neuropathology via direct neuronal reprogramming | Science
content: Late-onset Alzheimer’s disease (LOAD) is the most common form of Alzheimer’s disease (AD). However, modeling sporadic LOAD that endogenously captures hallmark neuronal pathologies such as amyloid-β (Aβ) deposition, tau tangles, and neuronal loss remains ...
